Title: Allows a board of directors or board of managers to take action against an objectionable tenant who fails to comply with the by-laws or rules and regulations of the condominium or homeowners association
Summary: Allows a board of directors or board of managers to take appropriate action against an objectionable tenant who fails to comply with the by-laws or rules and regulations of the condominium or homeowners association.
LawSection: Real Property Actions and Proceedings Law
LawCode: Amd §721, RPAP L; amd §§339-j & 339-dd, RP L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property actions and proceedings law and the real property law, in relation to allowing a board of directors or board of managers to take appropriate action against an objectionable tenant who fails to comply with the by-laws or rules and regulations of the condominium or homeowners association
